Michael Biography

Michael Galleotti was born on August 28, 1984, in New York City. Recently, he moved with his parents to Manchester City, USA. His parents names are Mike and Sheila Galeotti. Galeotti belongs to a middle-class family with a humble background.

Michael, from the very start, created an interest in music, which enhanced that part and led him to join the rock band in 2004. Michael, during his time in the band, worked as a keyboardist and contributed significantly to the bank since his departure in 2012.

Soon, after understanding his biography, you will be thinking and wondering: How did such a young man die at the age of 31 years. What was the reason that led him to that path? So, below, we will first discuss the cause of Michael’s death.

Michael’s cause of death

Michael was known as a man of success and Miss Fortune. He got immense popularity in his time. At the same time, he got tremendous popularity in his big time. Similarly,he had several health problems. Just before his death, Michael went to a critical surgery just a week before his death and was also diagnosed with high blood cholesterol, hypertension, and the disease of diverticulitis.

He was not healthy before his death and was suffering from a lot of pain and health problems that kept him back in depression before his death. He was also admitted to the hospital for depression before his death but was discharged on his insistence as he wanted to go back home.

Soon after coming back home, he was at the breaking point. After that, Michael didn’t respond to phone calls from his working circle or receive any messages left on the door. He kept himself separate from the world. So after a week, one of his friends of Michael decided to pay him a vision to check what had happened to him.

Still, it was late upon visiting the friend came to know that Michael had been found death at his home. According to the investigation by the police team it came to know that his death was reported to be on January 11, 2016. While after an autopsy and postmortem, it was discovered that Michael had no drugs any illegal substance in his blood system. The cause of death was something different. Upon further investigation, doctors came to know and diagnose that the cause of Michael’s death was atherosclerotic heart disease.

This is a CBSE symptom, and the complication of this disease is that the plaque starts building up in the arteries, which reduces blood flow. This whole scenario creates a problem for any person, leading to a risk of heart attack that may occur.

Michael career

From the beginning, Michael had a great interest in music, so from that start, he worked and joined the Enation Band, where he worked with Amber Sweeney back in 2004. Also, he works with the brothers to do anything Jackson and Richard Lee do.

Later, the enation band was increased with a member, Daniel Sweet, on bass, but came to decrease when Amber left the band in 2005. Michael, however, with the band leads it from zero to success from 2004 to 2012.

During his time in the enation band has worked with various celebrities and released several albums, including the highly successful album World in Flight, which was released in 2008 and had songs like Feel This. You might have heard this song in the 5th season finale of the One Tree Hill series. This song was sung by Michael’s wife, Benthany Joy, and was composed by the Enation Band. The band and Michael have also been seen appearing in different series and have also released the great and successful album My Ancient Rebellion in 2011. After this album, Michael decided to leave the balance and start living a simple life due to his health problems.

After his death, his profile’s temporary divisions and deactivations became permanent, and Michael left this world.

Conclusion

Michael was a very popular musician, and the former was an enation member who had suffered from various health problems before his death. What is shocking news for many of his friends and especially for his family is that the reason and cause of his death were high blood pressure, diverticulitis, high cholesterol, and heart problems that led to his death.

After his death, his ex wife also expressed her sadness, mentioning that she always remembered him in good memories and that he was a very talented new member who always specialized in his music and art. She also asked a fans to express her loving condolences and share their memories with Michael.
